meanings.definition: A person who holds a permit.
meanings.sent1: The permittees were excited to start their construction project.
meanings.sent2: The permittees lined up to receive their official documents.
meanings.sent3: The permittees joked about having the power of permits.
meanings.sent4: The permittees were like the gatekeepers of the project.
meanings.sent5: The permittees were the key holders to the building kingdom.

meanings.definition: Those who are granted permission or authorization.
meanings.sent1: The permittees were allowed to enter the restricted area.
meanings.sent2: The permittees followed the rules set by the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The permittees celebrated their newfound freedom.
meanings.sent4: The permittees were like the chosen ones in the group.
meanings.sent5: The permittees were the lucky ones with the golden tickets.
